DOC.brief_summary: RESEARCH HYPOTHESIS -Incidence of preterm delivery is lower in women treated with oral micronized progesterone (Utrogestan) as acute tocolysis agent compare to Nifedipine group with fewer maternal side effect
DOC.brief_title: Utrogestan Versus Nifedipine as Tocolysis for Preterm Labor: a Randomised Controlled Trial
